properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:21PM HST until February 7 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR THE SUMMITS OF MAUNA KEA AND MAUNA
LOA...

.Deep moisture along a front will move over the Big Island
Thursday and Thursday night, producing periods of snow showers and
freezing rain. The threat of significant winter weather may extend
into Friday.

* WHAT...Snow showers and periods of freezing rain. Total snow
accumulations of up to 5 inches.

* WHERE...Big Island Summits above 10,500 feet.

* WHEN...From noon Thursday to 6 AM HST Friday. This advisory may
need to be extended into Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will
significantly reduce visibility at times, with periods of zero
visibility.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for
slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while
driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 6 AM HST FRIDAY
